verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) - [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: unloaded] [ARG1: on Homeland Security Secretary Kirstjen Nielsen] [ARGM-LOC: at a heated Cabinet meeting] [ARGM-TMP: this week] , [ARGM-ADV: railing against her for failing to stop illegal border crossings] .
